title: 3 ID
minInput: {{name}} must be at least {{min}} characters long.
chooseYourData: Choose name, records, and resolver type
why3IDContent: 3ID aims to make decentralized identity affordable and practical for everyone in the web3 space, whether users or curators. We leverage cutting-edge technologies to provide ENS-based subdomains. Our unique approach includes offering free and low-cost subdomains through off-chain storage and Layer 2 solutions, minimizing the users' barriers to entry. With upcoming features of subdomain marketplace and batch subdomain services, 3ID enables a new era of utilizing ENS domains' potential for personal identity, brand management, and business needs. Powered by technologies like CCIP read, Cloudflare Workers, and Layer 2 networks, 3ID ensures a secure and efficient experience across the Web3 ecosystem.
